name: Dog Crime Chase 2016- Offroad Police Racer Dog Simulator with Criminal Sniffer Hill Climb Missions
name_original: Dog Crime Chase 2016- Offroad Police Racer Dog Simulator with Criminal Sniffer Hill Climb Missions
description:
We bring to you an exciting Police dog search game over the mountain and hill towns. The law enforcement Police department has conducted a police sting operation in hilly crime town. The Trained police Dog German Shepherd has been called to clean the city from criminals.

Play as the lawfully licensed Police Dog in this Crime Simulator. Be the best clever dog to help the police officers keep the mountain downtown city in order and sniff out bombs to prevent offroad hill crimes. Complete different thrilling missions within Specified time.

Enjoy excellent mountain racing game play of the hunting dog in realistic 3d hill environment. A perfect game for all the dog lovers and city crime lovers. Play this DOG CRIME CHASE 2016 today.
